name: testtoggler
description: Toggle back and forth from tests and source

testToggler.testFilePattern.description: Enter a custom test file name.

testToggler.testFolderName.description:
Enter the folder name(s) you keep tests in.
Enter multiple names in a glob pattern (e.g. '{FolderName1,FolderName2}')

Defaults are 'test(s)', 'spec(s)', '__test(s)__', and '__spec(s)__'

testToggler.confirmOnSinglePossibilityWh.description: The fallback strategy is a global search for the test/source file pattern. Depending on your codebase, this has a larger chance of yielding false positives. In this situation, a list of possible file matches will be presented to you. If there's only 1 match, and this option is NOT checked, it will just toggle to the file.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
